starting_after.description: Use this to drive your next request if you want the next page of results

id.description: This, combined with the effective_at, determines the starting point in the db responses for your next request

effective_at.description: This, combined with the effective_at, determines the starting point in the db responses for your next request

ending_before.description: Use this to drive your next request if you want the previous page of results

id.description: This, combined with the effective_at, determines the starting point in the db responses for your next request

effective_at.description: This, combined with the effective_at, determines the starting point in the db responses for your next request

has_more.description: Indicates whether there are additional values beyond the ending index of the paginated results.
